id.description: The unique ID of the visitor activity

prospect_id.description: The ID of the prospect associated with the visitor activity

visitor_id.description: The ID of the visitor associated with the visitor activity

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the visitor activity

type_name.description: The name corresponding to the type of visitor activity

details.description: Additional details or information about the visitor activity

email_id.description: The ID of the email associated with the visitor activity

email_template_id.description: The ID of the email template associated with the visitor activity

list_email_id.description: The ID of the list email associated with the visitor activity

form_id.description: The ID of the form associated with the visitor activity

form_handler_id.description: The ID of the form handler associated with the visitor activity

site_search_query_id.description: The ID of the site search query associated with the visitor activity

landing_page_id.description: The ID of the landing page associated with the visitor activity

paid_search_id_id.description: The ID of the paid search associated with the visitor activity

multivariate_test_variation_id.description: The ID of the multivariate test variation associated with the visitor activity

visitor_page_view_id.description: The ID of the visitor page view associated with the visitor activity

file_id.description: The ID of the file associated with the visitor activity

campaign.description: The campaign associated with the visitor activity

created_at.description: The timestamp when the visitor activity was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the visitor activity was last updated
